thread.title: I Live Tweeted the Bachelor’s Hometown Dates
thread.title_full: I Live Tweeted the Bachelor’s Hometown Dates

author: Sean Lowe
title: I Live Tweeted the Bachelor’s Hometown Dates
text:
Close Comment count Biggest takeaway from my time on The Bachelor- genuine, long-lasting, true love can only be found on realty TV. 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 20, 2017 
Kinda excited to meet the nanny tonight. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 20, 2017 Samuel sat down and started playing Beethoven’s Piano Sonata #13 from memory. True story. https://t.co/oRNqtzmBeG 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 20, 2017 
Corinne, if he’s dating 3 other girls, he might not be your boyfriend. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 I can already tell Corinne’s dad will be the best part of this episode. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
4 years ago during hometowns, Catherine’s mom didn’t give me her blessing to propose to Catherine. 4 years later… still waiting on it. 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 Announcing a cancer-free prognosis on The Bachelor is the coolest thing this show’s ever done. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
I take it back, Raven’s dad is the best part of this episode. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 When my dad was on the show, everyone kept calling him Ned Flanders. Pretty accurate. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
Twice as funny. She’s extremely lucky. https://t.co/mpZemdt5me 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 Props to Rachel for putting her faith front and center. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
Something tells me it’s not going to work out with Nick and Rachel. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 I brought a Filipino girl home once. She never left. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
I’ve never been to an exclusive mall. Think I’ll pass. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 Raquel is very normal and not funny. I’m pretty disappointed. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
“Don’t forget it’s fantasy.”– Corinne’s mom 
She nailed it. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 Someone didn’t tell Vanessa’s family that this is all fantasy. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
“My dad can be a little awkward.”– Samuel has already said this too. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 Vanessa’s dad is a ball buster and it’s awesome. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
Poor naive Vanessa. #TheBachelor 
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017   
— Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 
She knew it was Andi everyone. There. https://t.co/VGBMpN2lxj
